ValidationRule.description: Rule to prevent advice from moving to suitability before risk questionnaires are complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Advice_Status__c ), OR ( TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'Ready for suitability', TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'Suitability in progress', TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'Deck complete', TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'Await decision', TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'In fulfilment', TEXT(Advice_Status__c) = 'Complete' ), OR ( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Advice_Status__c)) = 'Setup', TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Advice_Status__c)) = 'Data Gathering', TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Advice_Status__c)) = 'Risk call' ), ISPICKVAL(Advice_Household__r.OW_rtq_status__c, "Expired") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: RTQs for this household have expired and will need to be updated before you can progress to Ready for suitability
